column4: hey guys.. know where I can find mdia bar drivers for a sony laptop... been lookig for 3 days
which version of Linux are you running? I might be able to help with that...
Okay, you are trying to get your multimedia keys to work, right?
it's an actual media bar like a touch pad... I tried the key set up already...
have you tried xev, to detect if it's being seen correctly?
specifically, you'll want to run 'xev' from a terminal, so you can see if your media bar is sending any commands.
yep, it generates a LOT of data...!
you're going to look for the "keycode" info... that tells you which button has been pressed.
only thing similar is a keymap notify entry
it has info on how to assign multimedia functions to various keys. Give that a try.
so I use that 'code' in the keyboard mapping utility?
I think so. Give it a try.
I can't find where to put it...
